Description:
Large 2 storey townhouse
With its own street frontage, private driveway to large auto garage and direct entry into the home this property offers excellent accommodation. The home also features a large entrance foyer, powederroom, separate laundry, spacious kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances overlooking a large family room, 3 large bedrooms (BIR's), main with ensuite and WIR plus separate study. With heating/cooling and a large rear garden this home will not disappoint.
Photo ID Required

Description:
Exceptional Modern Elegance! Even Greater Location!
Nearly new double storey townhouse with your own driveway and 6 Star Energy Rating
This magnificent townhouse is perfectly situated in one of Clayton South's finest streets with privacy & peaceful surroundings. Architecturally designed to the highest standards and opposite the leafy green Bald Hill Park, this will sure to excite you!
As you walk into this fabulous architecturally designed home with high ceiling and polished Tasmanian oak floorboards throughout, the flowing floor plan will lead you to the elegant open living room, and modern open kitchen with separate dining area, plus sliding doors leading to the beautiful alfresco with timber decking, perfect for entertaining family and friends, separate laundry room, and powder room downstairs. Upstairs three spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes, master bedrooms with ensuite, plus balcony with park view, and modern family bathroom.
Comprising: Tasmanian Oak hardwood floors through out, living room, family/ meals area, 3 robed bedrooms, ensuite to master bedrooms, central bathroom, 40mm stone benchtops, 700mm Blanco stainless steel cooktop, 750 Blanco oven and rangehood, dishwasher, powder room, ducted heating and evaporative cooling system, 2000L water tank, remote controlled garage with your own driveway and much, much more!
All conveniently located within minutes to Clayton Central Shopping District, local schools, public transport, Monash Medical Centre & Monash University, what more can you want?
Inspect and make an offer!

Description:
Position & Space!
With an exceptional combination of style and space, this superb modern villa holds broad appeal to those seeking an upgrade, while offering no compromise on quality or outdoor living for those who are ready to downsize.
Positioned peacefully at the rear, and comprising 3 double bedrooms with generous robes, including the
master with ensuite,
stylish hostess kitchen with open plan dining, elegant living room, modern family bathroom, private rear garden & remote garage. With a contemporary colour palette used throughout, floating floors, ducted heating, split system cooling and security alarm, this may be the perfect proposition for a low maintenance lifestyle in this sought after locale, walking distance from Claytons' thriving shopping & transport district.

Description:
SOLD IN 2 DAYS
Take this rare opportunity to secure this truly unique purpose built modern town house located in Clayton South. Local to Clayton South Primary school with a choice of Clarinda and Clayton Central shops, you are sure to be delighted with this outstanding setting. Cleverly situated to maximize your privacy in a quiet area, this property boasts many designer touches. Large lounge and dining area , leading to a stylish and practical modern style kitchen with stainless appliances. An energy efficient open plan design incorporates three spacious bedrooms upstairs with 2 bathrooms and large living and dining area. Downstairs a powder room, 3 split systems and an over-sized single Garage with storage & shelving . If lifestyle is what you are after, inspect this home with confidence.

Description:
Convenient Location and Lifestyle with huge balcony.
This 2 bedroom apartment, close to train station will impress the most discerning of buyers. With quality carpets, fixtures and fittings, this home is under 2 years old and boasts; 2 spacious bedroom's with built-in-robes, large living, dining, tiles to all wet areas, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. The contemporary bathroom is a real WOW, with a European style laundry included and a huge balcony for those warm balmy nights to relax on.
Other features include: air-conditioning, heating and an undercover car space on title.
Within walking distance to Westall Train Station, schools, Springvale Homemaker Centre, shops, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
With high rental returns achievable and in such a convenient location, this is surely an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Modern, Spacious Home - Under Contract
First home buyers and investors - Here It Is! This bright and spacious single storey villa residence nestled quietly in one of the best pockets of Clayton South has been designed to maximise space and kept low maintenance lifestyle in mind.
Property comprises large, modern open plan living and dining areas, complimented by a solid timber kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, 3 extra large bedrooms with BIRs, main bedroom with WIR and full ensuite, family bathroom, separate laundry, ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, alarm, large backyard with paved BBQ area, single garage and another car space for extra comfort.
All this is located within a short walk to Clayton shops, station, bus routes, library, schools and medical practitioners. Also only minutes from Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
Inspection is a must!

Description:
A FLEXIBLE HOME WITH SPACE FOR GROWING OR EXTENDED FAMILIES
With space for a growing family or even an extended one, this home can be tailored to suit just about any situation. In a great court position just minutes away from buses, Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton, the home has been very well cared for throughout its life and presented in impressive condition. Behind its classic brick façade you find a generous lounge room complemented by a family/meals area that incorporates the kitchen with wall oven, gas cooktop and a dishwasher. Accommodation is really flexible too with up to 4 bedrooms including a rear set master with an ensuite that adjoins the rumpus room with kitchenette that could all be used as a self-contained wing for extended family. There's also a family bathroom, ducted heating and cooling, a single garage and a lovely back garden.
Insights: 12 Barringun Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Superior Size Close To All Amenities
A highly contemporary design marries perfectly with a stunning sense of open spaciousness at this sleek & stylish town residence. Visually appealing, neutral tones introduce a generous living/meals area incorporating a premium kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage, with sliding doors creating a seamless transition to an easy-care rear garden. Fitting right into your idea of modern living, this flawless fusion of light & family-sized living, offers 4 bedrooms (main with ensuite), luxe main bathroom and study/5th bedroom. Equipped with ducted heating & double garage, within walking distance to Westall train station, and moments to Monash university, Monash Medical, Ikea, Springvale shopping, Chadstone shopping and freeway access.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
Cash Flow Positive Investment? Big Income or Family Home!
All offers in by 18th March at 7pm. With lowest interest rate ever, you could realistically own this magnificent investment property for almost next to nothing, as the income that can be derived from this 6/7 Bedroom, 3 bathrooms, 3 toilets and 2/3 living areas brick home may cover your loan repayment.
Situated within walking distance to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping Strip and a short stroll to either Westall or Clayton train station, make this location an area that will surely appreciate in value in the future.
Ready to rent out or perfect for a large extended family with more than enough rooms to accommodate all members of the family. An inspection will not disappoint, a FANTASTIC investment or a GREAT family home.
Special Features
Potential to return $700-$900pw in rental return*
6 Bedrooms with easy conversation to 7/8
3 Bathrooms/ 3 Toilets
2-3 Living Areas
Master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite
Ample storage and cupboards throughout
Large undercover paved outdoor area
Ducted Heating and Cooling
2 Car Carport, plus room for many more cars
Semi Circle Driveway ( 2 Cross Overs)
Land size 697m2
More photos and floor plan to come, call now for more information and inspection.

Attention first home buyers, down-sizers and investors! Featuring high quality finishes throughout, stainless steel appliances, heating and cooling, landscaped gardens, remote control garage and much, much more!
Close proximity to the Westall Train Station, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre, what more could you want?

Description:
CHIC, EASY-CARE LIVING CENTRAL TO LIFESTYLE BENEFITS
Nestled in a sought after village estate, boasting a central lifestyle location, this low maintenance townhouse offers a convenient lifestyle for families, young professionals or an effortless opportunity for the savvy investor. Positioned steps away to the new Westall train station and just minutes from Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary and Clayton Shopping strip, modern architectural styling introduces an open plan floorplan comprising a fully equipped stone kitchen with stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar and adjoining family/meals domain, that extends out to a north-east facing courtyard ideal for indoor/outdoor entertaining. 3 robed bedrooms are zoned upstairs including a main with ensuite and walk-in-robe, complemented by a central bathroom, powder room, ducted heating, under stair storage, storage cage, water tank and single garage with internal access.
Photo ID required for all open for inspections.

Description:
Funky Warehouse / Living Area (STCP)
Imagine living where you run your business....
There are countless possibilities with this double storey space in popular business park. Retiring builder used this as a display suite to sell 'pre-order' 2 bdrm apartments.
Work from downstairs in this 110 m2 (apx) clean tidy warehouse space with roller door, excellent natural light, plentiful storage, kitchenette and bathroom facilities.
The Upstairs office zone could double as your private haven to escape after a log day's work, (apx 100m2) comprising large client reception area with great storage or your sumptuous living area, 2 separate office/ bedrooms (built in cupboards), open plan stylish full kitchen, main central tiled bathroom.
On site car parking x 3, security entry gates to business park, centrally located off Clayton Rd with easy access to M1 Freeway, Eastlink and Westall Road extension.
Inspection will impress.

Description:
INSPECT THIS SATURDAY BETWEEN 11.00AM TO 11.45AM!
ATTENTION HOME BUYERS AND INVESTORS!
Located a short distance from the delights of Clayton Village this stunning three bedroom home is set on generous dual occupancy allotment.
Impressively presented this delightful 'light and bright' property boasts a large entrance hall generous formal living room, three spacious bedrooms, classic kitchen with dining zone, family bathroom, separate laundry and superb 'north-facing' courtyard.
Additional features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, polished timber flooring, high ceilings, quality window furnishings, gas cooking facilities and more.
No formal owners corporation (body corporate).
This 'picture perfect' home is located a short stroll from Clayton train station, Clayton shopping Centre and Clayton Aquatic Centre whilst also being conveniently positioned a short distance from Monash Hospital, Monash University, various schools, sporting fields and bus routes.
Inspect today!

Description:
Spacios And Well Mainteined 2 Bedroom Unit
Tucked neatly at the rear of a well maintained block this unit offers plenty for first home buyers and investors where a low maintenance style of home is becoming increasingly popular. Surprisingly spacious, it features polished hardwood floors throughout, a generous living and kitchen area. Both bedrooms feature built in wardrobes. Extras include a gas heating, split system air conditioning, full laundry, single car port and second car space. Very spacious backyard that is both private and easy to maintain. Well positioned with buses out the front, the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.

Description:
Stamp Duty Savings on this Expansive Townhouse!
With easy access to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton shopping village, Westall train station and Bus facilities. This spacious four bedroom plus study brick veneer townhouse with it's own individual driveway is perfect for the First Home buyer and astute investor offering luxurious low maintenance living situated in a peaceful location.
Comprising: four spacious bedrooms with BIR's (main with Ensuite and WIR), study, three bathrooms, three toilets and separate laundry.
Features: Remote single lockup garage, LCD Camera intercom system, ducted heating and cooling system, kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops and s/steel 900mm appliances, dishwasher and much more.
Plan is available in the office for viewing.
Construction expected to be completed July 2015.
Insights: 27 other 4 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Under Contract/Under Offer
Perfectly positioned, this desirable townhouse is immaculately presented. Unwind in style courtesy of a light and bright lounge that's abundant in size, while equally spacious in nature is the meals/kitchen area that's defined by its openness and light appearance. The charming kitchen is superbly equipped with stainless-steel appliances. Three robed bedrooms. The home includes, ducted heating, 2 bathrooms, large alfresco courtyard for the sunny days and double remote garage.
Within walking distance to Clayton Shopping Strip, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, Westall Train Station and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre and Chadstone Shopping Centre, you will not find a better growth location!
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
Affordable Family Home
This comfortable family home is conveniently close to Clayton shops, train station, Monash University, Monash Hospital, kinder and schools. On a flat block of just over 580m2, with ample front and back yards, the house consists of separate lounge and dining, meals, kitchen, 3 spacious bedrooms (2 with robes), main bath, separate toilet and single garage with rear workshop. Features timber floor, security blinds, ducted heating, wall aircons and solar panels. Suits first home buyers and savvy investors.
Insights: 18 Glencannon Crescent, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT
This amazing home unit will be a joy to own. Start saying 'wow' upon entry and from there it just gets better.
Light filled with its northerly aspect and positioned in one of the most sought after pockets in Clayton South, there is absolutely nothing more you could want out of this spacious, open plan, street front villa unit.
Comprising of 2 good size bedrooms, large central living area, deluxe kitchen overlooking spacious family meals, renovated central bathroom, laundry and WC.
Features Include: stainless steel appliances, polished floor boards, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, mirrored built in robes and quality window furnishings.
Further enhanced by a delightful picturesque private courtyard, garage accommodation, which ideally could be used as a games, utility or study room, additional off street parking, and huge front garden.
Close to all family amenities, with easy access to parks, train Station, bus services and Monash Medical.
Insights: 1/62 Bevan Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.
